entry.title: The new obfuscation patch & GetStats
entry.summary: A patch author responds to a question about the recently merged "obfuscation" patch for Bitcoin's CLevelDBWrapper. The obfuscation is handled by CLevelDBWrapper's Read/Write methods, but the author raises concern that it should also be applied when iterating over the database as users of CLevelDBWrapper may deal with obfuscated data. The author suspects that the implementation of GetStats may be dead code and will investigate further.
